card_text: 1 "Eldlich" monster + 1 Level 5 or higher Zombie monster$NThis card's name becomes "Eldlich the Golden Lord" while on the field. Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. You can Tribute 1 Zombie monster, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of it, but it cannot attack or activate its effects this turn. You can only use this effect of "Eldlich the Mad Golden Lord" once per turn.
